projects.title: CryptoPlace
projects.description: A comprehensive cryptocurrency tracking and portfolio management platform with real-time market data and advanced analytics.
projects.longDescription: CryptoPlace is a full-stack web application that provides users with comprehensive cryptocurrency market insights. The platform features real-time price tracking, portfolio management, technical analysis tools, and market sentiment indicators. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a seamless user experience for both novice and experienced crypto traders.
features: Interactive price charts with technical indicators

projects.title: GradHelp
projects.description: An AI-powered platform connecting graduate students with mentors and resources for academic success.
projects.longDescription: GradHelp is an innovative platform designed to support graduate students throughout their academic journey. The application uses machine learning algorithms to match students with compatible mentors, provides personalized study resources, and offers collaborative tools for research projects. The platform has helped over 1,000 graduate students improve their academic performance and networking opportunities.

projects.title: Fourie
projects.description: A mathematical visualization tool for Fourier transforms and signal processing education.
projects.longDescription: Fourie is an interactive educational tool designed to help students and professionals understand Fourier transforms and signal processing concepts. The application provides real-time visualizations of mathematical functions, interactive demonstrations, and step-by-step explanations of complex mathematical operations.

projects.title: Concord
projects.description: A team collaboration platform with integrated project management and communication tools.
projects.longDescription: Concord is a comprehensive team collaboration platform that combines project management, real-time communication, and file sharing in one unified interface. The platform is designed to streamline workflows for remote and hybrid teams, featuring intuitive project boards, video conferencing, and advanced reporting capabilities.

projects.title: F1 App
projects.description: A comprehensive Formula 1 racing application with live timing, statistics, and fan engagement features.
projects.longDescription: The F1 App is a comprehensive mobile and web application for Formula 1 enthusiasts. It provides live race timing, detailed driver and constructor statistics, interactive circuit maps, and social features for fan engagement. The app integrates with official F1 APIs to deliver real-time race data and historical analytics.

projects.title: Side Project
projects.description: A personal productivity app with habit tracking, goal setting, and mindfulness features.
projects.longDescription: This personal productivity application combines habit tracking, goal setting, and mindfulness practices in a clean, intuitive interface. The app uses gamification principles to encourage consistent behavior and includes analytics to help users understand their productivity patterns and make informed improvements to their daily routines.
